topic.title: This is the abstract description of <text> and <ph> elements according to DITA-OT 1.5 M3

body.p:
text_ph_element text_ph_element: this case test whether the new build can support the new elements or not and its simple conref
Step1: Run the map.ditamap
Step2: Check dita2.dita and dita3.dita
text_ph_reference: this case test whether the complex conref of the new elements through conref and conrefend
Step1: Run the map.ditamap
Step2: Check dita2.dita and dita3.dita
